content.webTitle: Populist: items of interest this week

fields.headline: Populist: items of interest this week
fields.bodyText: Greta expectations Greta Gerwig stars in Damsels In Distress, the first film from Whit Stillman since 1998's The Last Days Of Disco and much hyped after its London Film Festival screening last week. "Like a posh Mean Girls" says our spy. Echelon v Little Monsters v Beliebers Nominees in an all-new "Biggest Fans" category at this year's MTV EMAs include 30 Seconds To Mars, Justin Bieber and Lady Gaga. (Real showdown in carpark after.) New Carjack City Check www.rockstargames.com for the Grand Theft Auto V trailer on Wednesday. Personal surveillance Slow-jam lo-fi funk anyone? Nite Jewel's She's Always Watching You 7" comes with a handwritten letter from Ramona Gonzalez. This Is Hard-choir Feist's three backing singers have been stealing the show in their nerd-scout outfits. And they're a real band, too! Check out mountainman.bandcamp.com A New Hope After guesting on Massive Attack's epic Four Walls, Hope Sandoval's back in her day job – a new Mazzy Star album is out in 2012. Dreamy single Common Burn up first. Board To Death Fancy Cluedo with crossbows? Monopoly with zombies? Then play the Walking Dead game, coming soon. BYO crossbow. twitter.com/guideguardian guardianguide.tumblr.com
